plugins.name: Conversor de REM a PX
plugins.description:
Simplifica la conversión entre REM y PX con esta herramienta práctica y eficiente. Este plugin es ideal para diseñadores y desarrolladores que trabajan con unidades relativas y absolutas, permitiéndote calcular valores de forma rápida y precisa.


Características Principales

✅ Conversión bidireccional: Convierte fácilmente entre PX y REM, y viceversa.

🎯 Configuración de tamaño base: Personaliza el tamaño base de fuente (default 16px) para adaptarlo a tus proyectos.

💡 Resultados instantáneos: Obtén los resultados con solo un clic.

📋 Copia fácil al portapapeles: Copia los valores resultantes directamente con un botón.

⚡ Interfaz amigable: Diseño limpio e intuitivo que facilita el flujo de trabajo.


¿Cómo usarlo?

  1. Define el tamaño base de la fuente: Ingresa el tamaño base (por ejemplo, 16px).
  2. Ingresa el valor a convertir: Escribe el número en PX o REM.
  3. Selecciona el tipo de conversión: Elige entre PX a REM o REM a PX.
  4. Presiona "CONVERTIR": Obtén el resultado al instante y cópialo si lo necesitas.


🚀 Feedback Bienvenido

Este conversor es un MVP pensado para facilitar tu trabajo diario. ¿Qué más te gustaría incluir? ¡Déjame tus sugerencias y ayuda a que esta herramienta sea aún más útil!
plugins.tagline: Convierte fácil entre px y rem para un diseño más preciso y consistente.

112325.name: Conversor de REM a PX

¿Cómo usarlo?

plugins.name: Component Viewer
plugins.description:
Component Viewer Plugin for Figma


Overview: The Component Viewer plugin enhances your design workflow in Figma by providing a quick and easy way to visualize all components and instances present on a page. With a simple button, you can activate or deactivate the highlighting of components, making it easier to manage and review your designs.


Features:

  1. Instant Visualization: Quickly view all components and instances on the current Figma page.
  2. Simple Toggle: Activate or deactivate the highlighting with a single button press. The button is centrally located for easy access.
  3. Custom Highlighting: Components and instances are displayed with a vibrant red fill when activated, making them stand out clearly against the design.
  4. Reset to Default: Deactivating the plugin restores the original appearance of your components, ensuring no permanent changes are made to your design.


User Interface:

  1. Centralized Toggle Button: The intuitive interface features a toggle button with two states:
  2. Activate: Displays components in red with white text.
  3. Deactivate: Returns components to their default state with a light grey background and black text.
  4. Responsive Design: The plugin interface is designed to be clean and user-friendly, ensuring a seamless integration into your Figma environment.


Use Cases:

  1. Perfect for designers looking to audit their components and instances within a project.
  2. Useful for collaborative sessions where multiple team members need to focus on specific design elements.


Installation: Simply select Component Viewer plugin from the Figma plugins menu, and you’re ready to streamline your design process!

accepted.name: Marta IB
accepted.description:
Hola! I am passionate UX designer, who specializes in crafting user experiences that are accessible, thoughtful, and truly enjoyable.
https://martaib.com/

plugins.tagline: Enhance your design flow with Component Viewer—highlight and manage your Figma components easily!

plugins.name: BatchGen
plugins.description:
BatchGen: Effortlessly Populate Your Figma Designs with Realistic Content


BatchGen is a powerful Figma plugin designed to help designers quickly generate and update content in bulk. Whether it’s names, numbers, addresses, emails, company names, or ratings, BatchGen brings dynamic, customizable data directly into your Figma projects, saving you time and streamlining your workflow.


Key Features:


•Batch Update: Select multiple text layers or search within groups to quickly batch update content.

•Random Numbers: Generate random numbers with optional prefixes to create custom combinations.

•Random Names: Create realistic names (first, last, or full) with options for prefixes and gender.

•Random Dates: Generate dates within a specified range in your preferred format.


Pro Features:


Unlock premium content generation for even more customization:


•Addresses: Generate complete addresses, including postal codes, cities, and countries.

•Emails: Create random email addresses with customizable formats and domains.

•Numbers: Define ranges, formats, and prefixes for random number generation.

•Company Names: Generate unique company names based on industry and location preferences.

•Monetary Values: Create realistic currency values with customizable ranges and currencies.

•Ratings & Scores: Generate ratings in stars, percentages, or decimals with customizable ranges.


BatchGen is the perfect tool for designers who want to enhance their workflow and bring designs to life with ease.
plugins.tagline: Ultimate Content Generation Tool for Figma

117757.release_notes:
BatchGen Release Notes – [Version 2.1]

Release Date: 31/1/2025

🚀 Improvements
•      Security Enhancements: Strengthened data handling and storage to ensure better protection of sensitive information.
•Performance Optimisations: Faster generation of content, reducing processing time and improving overall efficiency.

🛠 Bug Fixes
•Resolved an issue where certain random generation fields were not updating correctly.
•Fixed UI glitches that occasionally caused misalignment in generated content.
•Improved stability when handling large-scale batch operations.

plugins.name: MTG Deckbuilding Tools
plugins.description:
If you love brewing decks for Magic the Gathering, you may feel frustrated with the tools available to you. If only there was a super fluid and performant digital canvas that could let you seamlessly organize and brainstorm decks... Oh wait that's figma!


Normally you'd have to copy and paste all the cards from a decklist into figma. This plugin makes it 100x easier by letting you just paste in a decklist and automatically place images of the cards you're considering into a figma file.


When you're done, you can export a decklist to go buy cards with online or put into Arena or etc. for playing.
plugins.tagline: Import and Export Magic Decklists

75295.name: MTG Deckbuilding Tools
75295.description:
If you love brewing decks for Magic the Gathering, you may feel frustrated with the tools available to you. If only there was a super fluid and performant digital canvas that could let you seamlessly organize and brainstorm decks... Oh wait that's figma!


Normally you'd have to copy and paste all the cards from a decklist into figma. This plugin makes it 100x easier by letting you just paste in a decklist and automatically place images of the cards you're considering into a figma file.


When you're done, you can export a decklist to go buy cards with online or put into Arena or etc. for playing.

plugins.name: StickerSplit
plugins.description:
StickerSplit is a no-UI, utility-first Figma plugin that automatically slices an image sheet into individual stickers (images) by detecting and extracting non-transparent areas. Perfect for designers working with sticker packs, sprite sheets, or visual assets that need quick, clean separation.


Note: If using Figma's native "Remove Background" before running this plugin, you'll need to run the plugin on a PNG copy (Copy as PNG) or remove the original image fill. This is because Figma's Remove Background action is non-destructive and adds a second image fill, so the plugin will process the image with both image fills and not find any transparent areas to cut along.

accepted.name: Farren Wang
accepted.description: Farren's Figma account. Here you'll find stuff she's proud of.

plugins.tagline: Split your image sheets in one click.

134165.name: StickerSplit
134165.description:
StickerSplit is a no-UI, utility-first Figma plugin that automatically slices an image sheet into individual stickers (images) by detecting and extracting non-transparent areas. Perfect for designers working with sticker packs, sprite sheets, or visual assets that need quick, clean separation.


Note: If using Figma's native "Remove Background" before running this plugin, you'll need to run the plugin on a PNG copy (Copy as PNG) or remove the original image fill. This is because Figma's Remove Background action is non-destructive and adds a second image fill, so the plugin will process the image with both image fills and not find any transparent areas to cut along.
134165.tagline: Split your image sheets in one click.

plugins.name: A11y Helper - Test for Accessibility
plugins.description:
This plugin aims to help UX/UI designers integrate accessibility awareness and thoughtful design throughout their workflows.


Test elements of your design with integrated colour-blindness simulation, contrast, text size, hierarchy and ALT-text checkers.


I'll be adding to the plugin over the next few months, with features such as,

  1. Automated fixes such as quick text colour adjustment to meet contrast requirements, and colour suggestions
  2. Batch processing & (hopefully) accessibility report generation
plugins.tagline: Make accessibility a priority at every step.

127447.name: A11y Helper - Test for Accessibility
127447.description:
This plugin aims to help UX/UI designers integrate accessibility awareness and thoughtful design throughout their workflows.


Test elements of your design with integrated colour-blindness simulation, contrast, text size, hierarchy and ALT-text checkers.


I'll be adding to the plugin over the next few months, with features such as,

  1. Automated fixes such as quick text colour adjustment to meet contrast requirements, and colour suggestions
  2. Batch processing & (hopefully) accessibility report generation
127447.release_notes: Fixed the issue where framed text that has a background fill would be misinterpreted as text on white background.
127447.tagline: Make accessibility a priority at every step.

plugins.name: ColorSync by Blader
plugins.description:
Plugin Description


ColorSync by Blader is an advanced tool for designers who need to generate professional color palettes, precise color harmonies, and perfectly balanced gradients. It uses functional algorithms to ensure professional-quality results directly in Figma.


Detailed Feature Breakdown


1. Core Controls


Color Picker


  1. Function: Sets the base color for all harmonies.
  2. Usage: Click to select any hue or manually enter HEX values.


Color Quantity


  1. Function: Controls palette size (1-20 colors).
  2. Pro Tip: Use 3-5 colors for minimalism, 10+ for complex systems.


Color Format


  1. Options: HEX, RGB, HSL.
  2. Function: Toggles value display (e.g., #FF5733 → rgb(255, 87, 51) → hsl(12, 100%, 60%)).


Dark/Light Mode


  1. Function: Optimizes UI for low-light or bright environments.


2. Harmony Types


  1. Each option uses color theory principles:


Complementary


  1. What it does: Creates 2 opposing colors (180° apart).
  2. Best for: Maximum contrast (CTAs, alerts).


Analogous


  1. What it does: Generates 3-5 adjacent colors (30° increments).
  2. Best for: Harmonious designs (branding, backgrounds).


Tints, Shades & Tones


  1. What it does: Produces luminosity/saturation variations (+20% tints, -20% shades).
  2. Best for: Design systems needing consistent scales.


Compound


  1. What it does: Blends complementary + analogous colors (4-6 colors).
  2. Best for: Data viz, illustrations requiring depth.


3. Output Sections


Generated Palette


  1. Content: Displays colors based on your settings.
  2. Pro Tip: Click any swatch to copy its value.


Color Buttons


  1. Function: Compact palette for quick design integration.


Gradient Generator


  1. What it does: Creates CSS-ready gradients from your palette.
  2. Usage: Copy/paste directly into Figma styles or CSS.


4. Advanced Features


Multilingual Support


  1. English, Spanish, and Chinese localization.


Smart Copy


On click:


  1. Shows "Copied!" confirmation
  2. Auto-formats to selected color space


Professional Use Cases


  1. UI Design: Build component libraries with perfect contrast ratios.
  2. Branding: Test logo color combinations instantly.
  3. Illustration: Find coherent shadow/light palettes.
  4. Presentations: Create slide decks with harmonious schemes.


Sample Workflow


  1. Set corporate blue (#2E86AB) as base color.


  1. Select "Compound" harmony with 6 colors.
  2. Copy the auto-generated gradient for hero banners.
  3. Export HSL values for design documentation.
plugins.tagline: Pro-grade color harmonies & palettes in one click

125716.name: ColorSync by Blader

plugins.name: Frame
plugins.description:
"Frame" is a Figma plugin designed to streamline your workflow by providing intuitive tools for repositioning and resizing objects within their parent frames.


Buy me coffee


Simply select the object you wish to reposition or resize, and then choose from a variety of predefined options in the "Frame" plugin panel. Whether you're aligning objects to the left, center, or right, or resizing them to occupy a specific portion of their parent frame, "Frame" makes the process quick and effortless.

accepted.name: Sunny
accepted.description: Solving some of the use cases my team encounters when working in Figma.

plugins.tagline: Resize and re-position objects quickly

Simply select the object you wish to reposition or resize, and then choose from a variety of predefined options in the "Frame" plugin panel. Whether you're aligning objects to the left, center, or right, or resizing them to occupy a specific portion of their parent frame, "Frame" makes the process quick and effortless.

plugins.name: QR code Maker
plugins.description:
A powerful Figma plugin that lets you generate customizable QR codes with ease. Change colors, add gradients, insert logos, and create unique designs—all while keeping it simple and user-friendly. Export your styled QR codes in high-quality PNG format and enhance your designs effortlessly!


Feature Suggestions:


Prototype QR Code Generator – generate QR codes that link to Figma prototypes, making it easier to share interactive designs with clients or teams.

Design Asset QR Codes – Allow users to generate QR codes that link to downloadable assets or design system documentation.

Social Media Links – Add options to create QR codes linking to social media profiles or portfolios directly from the design canvas.

Customizable Frames – Offer stylish frames or borders around QR codes to make them fit different design aesthetics.

Bulk QR Code Generation – Allow generating multiple QR codes at once for product packaging, business cards, or event badges.
plugins.tagline: Stylize & Export QR Codes – Your Way!

plugins.name: Text2palette
plugins.description:
Turn your ideas into stunning color palettes in seconds! ✨ text2palette uses AI to generate beautiful, well-balanced color schemes based on any text prompt. Whether you're designing UI, graphics, branding, or illustrations, this plugin makes color selection effortless.


🔹 How It Works:

  1. Describe your vision (e.g., "Sunset in Tokyo" or "Cyberpunk Neon").
  2. Choose the number of colors (2-8).
  3. Generate & preview your AI-powered palette.
  4. Insert the colors as rectangles in Figma with one click.


🌙 Sleek UI with dark mode, gradient styling, and shadows for a modern look.

⚡ Optimized for UI/UX, graphic design, and digital art.

🔑 Uses OpenAI to generate high-quality palettes (API key required).


🎨 Transform words into color with text2palette – your creative assistant for color magic! 🚀
plugins.tagline: 🎨 text2palette – Instantly Generate Color Palettes from Words!

plugins.name: ThumbSpan
plugins.description:
ThumbSpan helps you determine which UI elements

are particularly hard to reach with the thumb while using

the phone one-handed.


The Area of Reach of the thumb has been based on empirical evidence, sourced from academic studies. Please see the last picture for the current supported one-handed phone positions, more to be added soon...


How Does it Work

  1. ThumbSpan adds a gradient Layer to your frames.
  2. It is recommended to apply it on a copy of the frame
  3. The Copy should not have any Auto Layout.
  4. It allows you to select Opacity and Hand Position
  5. It also allows you to select between Left and Right Hand
  6. These Layers can be cascaded - applied one after another (You can apply it for both Left and Right hand together)




This Plugin is still in Beta, Please send any bug reports and feature requests to my email: its.shahab.khan10@gmail.com
plugins.tagline: Check which parts of your UI within the average thumbspan

plugins.name: Apply modes to all pages
plugins.description:
This plugin works by replicating the current page selected variable modes to every other page of the document.


Instructions

  1. Set the desired modes in the current page.
  2. While in the page, run the plugin.
  3. Check the other pages to see if the modes were applied correctly.


Useful information:

  1. The plugin will replace modes within the same collection.
  2. The plugin will not remove modes. If a page has an additional collection that is not in the current page, it will keep it.
  3. For large files, it might take a little while for the plugin to finish running, wait for a message saying ”✨ All done! ✨”. It might also take a while for the file to finish uploading.
plugins.tagline: Replicate Current Page Mode in all pages of the document

104411.name: Apply modes to all pages
104411.description:

  3. For large files, it might take a little while for the plugin to finish running, wait for a message saying ”✨ All done! ✨”. It might also take a while for the file to finish uploading.
104411.tagline: Replicate Current Page Mode in all pages of the document

plugins.name: Quick Section
plugins.description:
Features

  1. Create sections without manually changing colors each time.
  2. Add headers to organize your frames horizontally or vertically.
  3. Access features through the UI or quick menu actions.
  4. Set up keyboard shortcuts to perform quick menu actions faster.


How it works

  1. Select the layers you want to organize.
  2. Click an option from the UI or run it from the plugin menu.
  3. Sections and headers are created and aligned to your selections.


Alternatively, you can add sections or headers directly on the canvas without selecting any layers.

plugins.name: HCT Variablinator
plugins.description:
HCT Variablinator generates a color palette following Google's HCT color theory. It can then create a Figma Variables collection with all the tones created. You can then reference these through Aliases in your other collections.


Future features:

  1. Mode support - create new modes with same tokens to support different brands / themes
  2. Code gen for theming using style-dictionary for plug and play

plugins.name: UserPop – Random People Generator
plugins.description:
UserPop – Random People Generator

A simple, powerful Figma plugin that generates random user profiles with realistic data — perfect for designers, developers, and teams who need high-quality placeholder content for mockups and prototypes.


🔑 Key Features:

One-Click Generation

Instantly generate full user profiles with a single click — no setup required.


Complete User Data

Includes:


Profile pictures (in 3 sizes)


Name, age, and gender


Email, phone, and full address


Login credentials (username & password)


Clean, User-Friendly Interface


Minimal and organized layout


Easy-to-read content


Clickable profile images


Rotating ad banners (optional)


Smart Data Persistence


Automatically remembers the last generated user


Reloads the previous profile when the plugin is reopened


🎯 Perfect For:

UI/UX Designers


Web & App Developers


Design System Creators


Anyone needing quick, realistic user content for mockups

plugins.name: QR Code Styler
plugins.description:
QR Code Styler is a feature-packed Figma plugin that allows you to generate and fully customize QR codes directly within your design workflow. Whether you need a simple black-and-white QR code or a beautifully styled one that matches your brand identity, this plugin provides complete creative control.


How It Works:


1. QR Code Generation

Instantly create a QR code by entering any URL, text, or data string. With just a few clicks, the plugin generates a scannable QR code, ready to be styled to fit your design.


Supported Formats:

  1. URLs
  2. email addresses
  3. phone numbers
  4. vCards
  5. plain text


2. Customization Options

Transform standard QR codes into visually appealing design elements with powerful customization features:


  1. Shape Adjustments: Customize the corner radius and dot styles for a unique aesthetic.
  2. Logo Embedding: Place a logo or icon at the center without compromising scannability.


3. Error Correction & Optimization

Ensure scannability even with complex designs by adjusting error correction levels. The plugin optimizes QR codes to remain readable while allowing for creative styling.


Key Features:


Instant QR Code Generation – Create QR codes with various data types in seconds.

Advanced Styling – Customize colors, shapes to match your design.

Logo Embedding – Insert brand logos while maintaining scannability.

Smart Optimization – Adjust error correction levels for reliable scanning.
plugins.tagline: Generate and fully customize QR codes directly within your design workflow.

124046.description:

3. Error Correction & Optimization

plugins.name: Color Nexus
plugins.description:
Color is one of the most important tools for designers. Beyond its intrinsic properties, design also requires attention to the combination, contrast, and harmony between colors.To address these needs, we created Color Nexus, To present the contrast and harmony between colors, making the analysis and adjustment process more intuitive, professional, and convenient.


ColorNexus v2.0

New Feature: Intelligent Image Color Extraction

Easily extract three sets of professional color palettes from any image! ColorNexus v2.0 utilizes multiple advanced algorithms to provide diverse color inspirations for your designs.


V2.0 Key Features:

  1. Multi-Algorithm Support: Different algorithms are used to extract color palettes, ensuring diversity and uniqueness.
  2. Quick Switching: One-click to switch between different color schemes, making the operation simple and reliable.
  3. Flexible Adjustment: Adjust the extracted colors freely according to project requirements.


Operation Steps:

1.Select an Image: Choose any image in your Figma document.

2.One-Click Extraction: Click the image icon to quickly extract a color scheme.

3.Freely Switch and Adjust: Click the image icon repeatedly to switch between the three sets of color palettes. You can also fine-tune the extracted colors according to your needs. ColorNexus provides convenient color adjustment tools.


ColorNexusV1.0

Key Features:

  1. In ColorNexus, you can adjust the hue values of a group of colors within the same color wheel, intuitively observing the angular positional relationships of each color on the wheel. This allows you to quickly identify whether they are complementary colors, analogous colors, or any other contrasting relationships.


  1. ColorNexus utilizes the HSL model, ensuring that hue, saturation, and lightness are presented in a symmetrical relationship, providing a reliable foundation for your color analysis. Simultaneously, each color's saturation and lightness are displayed on the adjustment axis, allowing you to gauge the contrast strength by their positions relative to each other—the further apart they are, the more intense the contrast. This empowers you to create a myriad of color combinations.


  1. Additionally, ColorNexus supports one-click switching between RGB and RYB modes, enabling you to view color contrasts that are more aligned with traditional art theories.


  1. Overall, ColorNexus not only helps you create a harmonious and visually pleasing set of colors but also ensures that these colors form an organic whole, rather than isolated individual elements.


Color Addition Methods:

Extract colors from Figma documents.

Input 16-digit hexadecimal color values.

Quickly add basic colors.


Color Output:

After adjustments, hover over the color block and click the download icon to export the color to the current Figma canvas.


Use Cases:

Starting from Scratch: Use ColorNexus to create a brand-new color palette.

Expanding Existing Tones: Input one or several tones and easily add more colors to complement them.

Inspiration Capture: Input beautiful color combinations into ColorNexus, which will display the relationships between colors, helping you better understand and adjust them, thereby improving your color adjustment skills.


Tips:

The RYB color wheel does not support hue adjustments because its color gamut has a nonlinear relationship with RGB, and RGB is the most accurate for adjustments on computers.

The color wheel's drag handle automatically avoids overlap when hues are close, making operation convenient.

With a clean interface that matches Figma's light and dark themes, ColorNexus runs quickly and smoothly, making it an ideal color adjustment plugin.
plugins.tagline: effortlessly combine colors

114107.name: Color Nexus
114107.description:

plugins.name: Tint Smith
plugins.description:
TintSmith - Figma Color Scheme Plugin


Perfect for designers looking to jazz up their color palettes faster than you can say "magenta"!


Usage:


  1. Choose and name your color: Name your color or let the plugin flex its creative muscles with the Auto generate name option. Who knows, it might just name your color "Sassy Salmon"!
  2. Apply Color Schemes: Check Generate local styles to sprinkle those fancy color schemes onto your Figma Color Styles. It’s like magic, but with colors.
  3. Get Contrast Colors: For contrast colors from black and white, check Include contrast values. Your designs will thank you for the extra pop!
  4. Apply Styles: Click on Apply styles and watch your design transform into a visual masterpiece.


Have fun! ☕

Nathyane 😊
plugins.tagline: Effortlessly blend colors to enhance your design brilliance.

Perfect for designers looking to jazz up their color palettes faster than you can say "magenta"!

  1. Choose and name your color: Name your color or let the plugin flex its creative muscles with the Auto generate name option. Who knows, it might just name your color "Sassy Salmon"!
  2. Apply Color Schemes: Check Generate local styles to sprinkle those fancy color schemes onto your Figma Color Styles. It’s like magic, but with colors.
  3. Get Contrast Colors: For contrast colors from black and white, check Include contrast values. Your designs will thank you for the extra pop!
  4. Apply Styles: Click on Apply styles and watch your design transform into a visual masterpiece.


Have fun! ☕

plugins.name: Select and Inspect
plugins.description:
Why?


If you ever implemented a Figma plugin, you know how slow the process of inspecting specific properties (among the hundreds available) and values in a Figma file is.


This plugin aims to solve this problem by making logging as easy as possible!


Features

  1. Select one or more Figma elements to get them logged in the Console
  2. Add expressions to be evaluated on the selected Figma elements (name,id,reactions[0].actions results in each expression to be evaluated and logged in the Console)
  3. Stringy and format the result for better readability
  4. Preferences are stored locally


FAQ

Why not using the existing "Inspector" plugin?

Because the properties must be added to the UI by the plugin's author, limiting the plugin's scalability (as you can see in the reviews).
plugins.tagline: Select an item and get it logged in Console

84365.tagline: Select an item and get it logged in Console

plugins.name: BrandGuard
plugins.description:
Say goodbye to switching apps and enjoy the convenience of having your BrandGuard scores readily available wherever you do your best work.


This extension gives instant feedback on whether your content aligns with your brand, empowering you to make immediate improvements and maintain brand consistency everywhere you create content.


BrandGuard is the market leader at teaching machines to understand brands and branding.

plugins.name: getVector - Import SVGs from any URL
plugins.description:
Zendeeps | getVector


This plugin lets you import all SVGs from any URL directly into Figma.


  1. Just paste the URL into the plugin
  2. It automatically extracts all SVG files from the page
  3. Instantly adds them to your Figma file


No need to download assets one by one or copy-paste code. It saves time and keeps your workflow inside Figma.

accepted.name: Ruhul
accepted.description: Senior UX/UI Designer and Webflow Developer

plugins.tagline: Import SVGs into Figma from any website

plugins.name: ASCII Art Generator
plugins.description:
Bring old-school, retro ASCII magic straight into Figma with the ASCII Art Generator plugin! Turn any image—portraits, logos, icons—into radiant text-based artwork inspired by classic terminal visuals.


  1. Subscription via plugin or one-time payment license
  2. Get one-time-payment lifetime license here ->


Key Features

Live Image Import

Upload any image (JPG/PNG) or paste a URL and instantly see it in ASCII form.


Full Adjustment Controls

• Brightness, Contrast & Blur sliders

• Invert toggle for negative‐style art


Rich Dithering Options

• Floyd–Steinberg, Atkinson, Ordered Bayer & Noise dithering

• Toggle “Ignore White” to preserve whitespace


Multiple Character Sets

• Standard (@%#*+=-:.)

• Block (█▓▒░)

• Binary (0/1), Hex (0–F)

• Custom “Manual” character

• Ultra-detailed glyph palette


Edge-Detection Modes

• Sobel outline for high-contrast edges

• Difference-of-Gaussians “DOG” contour style


Flexible Output Formats (Pro)

• Editable text node in Figma (pro)

• PNG export

• SVG code insert (pro) Vector outline (path-based)


Seamless Insertion

One-click “Insert” drops your ASCII art into the canvas, centered and ready to tweak.


Copy & Share

Copy pure ASCII text to clipboard or export vector/SVG code for use elsewhere.


Free Trial & License

• 2 free insertions under trial (PNG)

• Easy upgrade flow via in-plugin “Upgrade” (current user) or “Activate License” (1 or multiple one-time-payment) buttons

• Usage counter and “mouse-follower” overlay when trial ends

accepted.name: Eugenio Ciccale
accepted.description:
I'm a Product Designer & Front-end developer creating Figma Plugins to enhance your creative workflows

https://shop.plusuidesign.com/

plugins.tagline: Convert images into ASCII art in Figma with brightness, contrast, dithering, and vector export

plugins.name: Swap remote to local instances and variables - Lazy Swap
plugins.description:
1. Swap remote instances to local instances.
  2. Select pages containing components for quick scanning.
  3. Select the necessary local components for quick swapping.
  4. Double-check to ensure all corresponding remote instances are fully converted to local instances.
  5. Swap remote variables to local variables.
  6. Select the types you want to swap.
  7. Double-check to ensure all corresponding remote variables are fully converted to local variables.

Easy and fast conversion. Free for you.
plugins.tagline: Swap remote instances to local instances and remote variables to local variables, easy and fast.

129143.name: Swap remote to local instances and variables - Lazy Swap
129143.description:
1. Swap remote instances to local instances.
  2. Select pages containing components for quick scanning.
  3. Select the necessary local components for quick swapping.
  4. Double-check to ensure all corresponding remote instances are fully converted to local instances.
  5. Swap remote variables to local variables.
  6. Select the types you want to swap.
  7. Double-check to ensure all corresponding remote variables are fully converted to local variables.

Easy and fast conversion. Free for you.
129143.tagline: Swap remote instances to local instances and remote variables to local variables, easy and fast.

plugins.name: Color Name Finder
plugins.description:
Ever wondered what your design colors are called? Select a layer, and this plugin tells you the exact name. Make your designs more expressive!


Perfect for every designer, developer, and accessibility experts.


  1. Fast: Instantly find color names
  2. Minimal: Clean, no-clutter UI
  3. Accurate: Precise color name detection



🚀 Upcoming features:

  1. 1-click copy color name
  2. Auto-rename layers by color name


Acknowledgments:

This plugin is powered by Name That Color open source library by Chirag Mehta.

accepted.name: Heeren Darji
accepted.description:

I want to craft beautiful interfaces and experiences that leave lasting impressions.
